DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find safe effective combination Mylotarg combination cytarabine treat patient Acute Myeloid Leukemia advance Myelodysplastic Syndrome age 60 year .
DOC.brief_title: Mylotarg Ara-C Untreated Patients Above 60 Years With AML High-Risk MDS
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate safety efficacy gemtuzumab ozogamicin combination cytarabine induce complete remission patient AML advance MDS age 60 year . Patients eligible treatment receive following : Mylotarg 6 mg/m2 day 1 2 hour intravenous infusion Cytarabine 100 mg/m2/day continuous intravenous infusion daily 7 day
DOC.criteria: Histologic diagnosis AML advance MDS No prior cytotoxic treatment AML . ( patient may treat prior biologic therapy ) Patients MDS AML evolve MDS , could receive prior lowdose cytotoxic therapy ( i.e . azacytidine lowdose araC ) . Uncontrolled severe cardiovascular disease pulmonary disease
